com.koverse.sdk.ingest.records

Interface FileBasedRecordsProvider

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Iterable<SimpleRecord>, RecordsProvider
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractFileBasedRecordsProvider

    public interface FileBasedRecordsProvider
extends RecordsProvider
    Provides records from files.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void configure(Map<String,String> options)
      Do any setup based on passed-in configuration options form the UI.
      boolean flatSchema()
      Whether or not this records provider produces a flat schema.
      Set<String> getFieldNamesSeen()
      Called after closing so that field names seen can be reported.
      int getPriority()
      Gets the priority of this records provider.
      Set<String> getSupportedExtensions()
      Get a set of FileExtensions supported by this provider.

      Provides the name of the file from which the input stream is providing data for.
      void setInputStream(InputStream input)
      Provides the input stream to use for receiving file data.
      void setPath(String path)
      Provides the path of the file that is being processed.

      • Methods inherited from interface com.koverse.sdk.ingest.records.RecordsProvider

        close, getDescription, getName, getParameters, getTypeId, getVersion

      • Methods inherited from interface java.lang.Iterable

    • Method Detail

      • getPriority

        int getPriority()
        Gets the priority of this records provider. The priority determines which records provider will be used when there are multiple records provider for the same MediaFormat. A higher number indicates a higher priority (preference). Should be a positive number.
        Returns:
        int.

      • getSupportedExtensions

        Set<String> getSupportedExtensions()
        Get a set of FileExtensions supported by this provider.
        Returns:
        the supposrted extensions

      • setInputStream

        void setInputStream(InputStream input)
             throws IOException
        Provides the input stream to use for receiving file data.
        Parameters:
        input - The input stream
        Throws:
        IOException - on error

      • setFilename

        void setFilename(String filename)
        Provides the name of the file from which the input stream is providing data for.
        Parameters:
        filename - The file name

      • setPath

        void setPath(String path)
      throws IOException
        Provides the path of the file that is being processed.
        Parameters:
        path - The path
        Throws:
        IOException - on error

      • configure

        void configure(Map<String,String> options)
        Do any setup based on passed-in configuration options form the UI.
        Parameters:
        options - the configuration options

      • flatSchema

        boolean flatSchema()
        Whether or not this records provider produces a flat schema.
        Returns:
        true if the schema is flat. false if nested fields are present

      • getFieldNamesSeen

        Set<String> getFieldNamesSeen()
        Called after closing so that field names seen can be reported.
        Returns:
        A set of field names.
